SELECT pi.key_id, pi.player_name, pi.team_id, pi.plyer_no, pi.sex, pi.birthday, pi.age, pi.education, pi.height, pi.weight, pi.account, pod.plary_location, pod.native_place, t.teanName, pod.on_depart_flag FROM player_info pi LEFT JOIN player_on_depart pod ON pi.key_id = pod.player_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT GROUP_CONCAT( ti.team_name ) AS teanName, tpi.player_id FROM team_info ti LEFT JOIN team_player_info tpi ON ti.key_id = tpi.team_id GROUP BY tpi.player_id ) t ON t.player_id = pi.key_id WHERE pi.delete_flag = 0
AND pi.player_name LIKE CONCAT('%' , #{qry.userName}, '%')
AND t.teanName LIKE CONCAT('%' , #{qry.teamName}, '%')
ORDER BY pi.create_time DESC
